feed.title: DHR Cute Pets 2025
feed.subtitle: Voting is open to DHR staff from 12/1-12/4 at 4:30PM. Each vote = $1 pledged with no limits. Vote for many pets! Come back as often as you like! You will receive a summary of pledges at the end of the contest. You must be logged into your COV account to vote or see results.
